    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handleError(java.lang.Throwable e)
      Communicates error messages to the user by calling method SimpleErrorHandler.printMessageAndCause(String, Throwable, int) and additionally provides a stack trace if debugMode is enabled.
      void handleFatalError(java.lang.Throwable e)
      Communicates fatal error messages to the user by calling method SimpleErrorHandler.printMessageAndCause(String, Throwable, int), provides a stack trace if debugMode is enabled, and exits the application.
      void handleWarning(java.lang.Throwable warning)
      Communicates warning messages to the user by calling method SimpleErrorHandler.printMessageAndCause(String, Throwable, int) and additionally provides a stack trace if debugMode is enabled.
      protected void print(java.lang.String text)
      Primitive operation, responsible for printing messages.
